lb = 0.01
ub = 0.3
ef = EfficientFrontier(*setup_efficient_frontier(data_only=True),
    weight_bounds=(lb, ub))
def kelly_objective(w, e_returns, cov_matrix, k=3):
    variance = cp.quad_form(w, cov_matrix)
    objective = variance * 0.5 * k - w @ e_returns
    return objective
weights = ef.convex_objective(kelly_objective, e_returns=ef.
    expected_returns, cov_matrix=ef.cov_matrix)
for w in weights.values():
    assert w >= lb - 1e-08 and w <= ub + 1e-08
